items.sentence: The hospital quarantined the infected patients to avoid cross infection.
Tom would be able to explain everything to you much better than I could.
Tom called Mary's mother and asked her if Mary was allergic to anything.
I suspect that Tom won't tell Mary the real reason he's going to Boston.
Tom and Mary spent the afternoon planning their first vacation together.
Tom knows some French, but not really enough to carry on a conversation.
You ought to get into the habit of brushing your teeth after every meal.
Tom handed Mary his car keys and told her that she could borrow his car.
I don't have good luck, so I don't play pachinko or buy lottery tickets.
To avoid interest charges, Tom pays his credit card in full every month.
The economy still hasn't completely recovered from the financial crisis.
She's determined to get back at her friend for stabbing her in the back.
If it hadn't been for your raincoat, I would've been soaked to the skin.
How much do you think it would cost to get to the zoo from here by taxi?
I've brought three cases of beer. We don't have to drink it all tonight.
I was tired yesterday when I got home from work, so I went to bed early.
I have three brothers. One lives in Japan and the other two live abroad.
I think we'll get there in time if we don't get caught in a traffic jam.
Tom is from another country, but I can't remember exactly which country.
I still have the sweater that you gave me when I was thirteen years old.
